long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Holiday/xmas is a fun and interesting game right on the chrome extension with simple gameplay. By selecting a function below the star and clicking on the person to perform that function. In order to make people go to the other door and keep the same, the more people, the higher the score.
